decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive play, utilizing low-cost creatures and burn spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. With cards like Zurgo Bellstriker leading the charge, the strategy is to overwhelm the opponent with a fast-paced assault before they have a chance to stabilize. Cards like Lightning Bolt, Incinerate, and Flames of the Blood Hand provide direct damage, while creatures like Goblin Rabblemaster, Hellrider, and Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh reinforce the aggressive game plan. The goal is to maintain a strong, relentless offense while disrupting the opponent's strategy with cards like Blood Moon and Sulfuric Vortex. By keeping up the pressure and staying proactive, this deck aims to secure a swift victory in the early game.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly and efficiently to play big threats like Primeval Titan and Avenger of Zendikar. It also utilizes Titania's ability to create Elemental tokens from lands entering the battlefield, making use of cards like Wood Elves and Sakura-Tribe Elder to trigger her ability multiple times. The deck includes various synergies with land-based cards like Crucible of Worlds and Exploration to ensure a steady stream of land drops. Additionally, cards like Sylvan Safekeeper and Constant Mists provide protection for key creatures, allowing for aggressive plays without fear of losing valuable pieces. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a relentless stream of threats while maintaining control of the battlefield through its land-based interactions.

This deck focuses on a fast and aggressive playstyle, utilizing the commander Bruse Tarl, Boorish Herder to support its aggro strategy. The deck is packed with efficient removal spells like Lightning Bolt, Swords to Plowshares, and Terminate to clear the way for its creatures to attack. It also includes powerful creatures like Dark Confidant, Gurmag Angler, and Bedlam Reveler to apply pressure on the opponent. To further enhance its aggressive game plan, the deck includes cards like Boros Charm, Zealous Persecution, and Secure the Wastes to boost its creatures' capabilities. With a strong mix of removal, creatures, and combat tricks, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its aggressive threats and secure a quick victory.

The deck focuses on controlling the game with a wide range of instant and sorcery spells to disrupt the opponent's strategy while also dealing damage through Vial Smasher's ability. The deck includes a variety of counterspells, removal spells, and card draw to maintain tempo and answer threats efficiently. Additionally, the deck features a mix of threats like True-Name Nemesis, Bedlam Reveler, and Snapcaster Mage to close out the game quickly once the opponent's resources have been exhausted. The mana base is carefully constructed to support the deck's color requirements and ensure consistent access to spells. Overall, the deck aims to apply pressure while disrupting the opponent's game plan to secure a victory.

This deck focuses on controlling the game by utilizing counterspells, removal spells, and board wipes to prevent opponents from developing their board and advancing their game plan. The commander, Narset, Enlightened Master, provides card advantage and powerful spells when attacking, allowing the player to gain an advantage over their opponent. The mana base is optimized for a variety of colors to cast diverse spells efficiently. The deck includes a mix of instant-speed interaction, card draw, and powerful planeswalkers to provide versatile answers to a wide range of threats. Overall, the deck aims to stall the game until it can establish a dominant board presence and win through overwhelming card advantage and powerful spells.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through a variety of efficient removal spells, countermagic, hand disruption, and card draw. Vial Smasher the Fierce's ability to deal damage based on the converted mana cost of spells adds an element of randomness to the aggression, punishing opponents for casting high-cost spells. The deck includes versatile instant spells like Lightning Bolt and Counterspell to disrupt opponents' plans while also providing card advantage with cards like Brainstorm and Demonic Tutor. The mana base is optimized to support the deck's color requirements and includes utility lands like Bojuka Bog and Wasteland to disrupt opponents' strategies. Overall, the deck aims to maintain control of the game while steadily dealing damage to the opponent.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of countermagic, removal, and card advantage while utilizing Vial Smasher the Fierce as a proactive threat to apply pressure on the opponent. By playing a wide range of instants, sorceries, and planeswalkers, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan, efficiently deal with threats, and generate value over the course of the game. The mana base is carefully crafted to support the deck's color requirements and provide flexibility in casting spells. Overall, the strategy revolves around maintaining a strong board presence and leveraging Vial Smasher's ability to deal damage unpredictably, forcing the opponent into difficult decisions and ultimately securing victory.
